title: Kotaynejeq kob'a b'ay coronavirus
allTitles: {"cak":"Richin man niqak'än ta ri COVID-19","en":"Avoid Covid-19","es":"Cómo evitar el COVID-19","kjb":"Kotaynejeq kob'a b'ay coronavirus"}
copyright: Copyright © 2021, Ministerio de Educación de Guatemala y USAID.
summary: Forma parte de la serie de libros en idiomas mayas para el cuidado y prevención de contagios por coronavirus, incluye audio y preguntas de comprensión.

27.es: Coordinación: Emilio Ajquejay, Justo Magzul y Sophia Maldonado. Contextualización: Felipe Mateo Nicolás.                                           Edición: Sonia Raymundo González.

33.cak: Mani nachop ri awäch, ri atza'n chuqa ri achi'.
33.kjb: Junjun el chi komitx' junoq tzet yetal, yowalil chi kotx'aj koq'ab' yetoq a'ej k'al xapon.

34.cak: Mani nachop ri awäch, ri atza'n chuqa ri achi'.
34.kjb: Junjun el chi komitx' junoq tzet yetal, yowalil chi kotx'aj koq'ab' yetoq a'ej k'al xapon.

35.cak: Mani nachop ri awäch, ri atza'n chuqa ri achi'.
35.kjb: Junjun el chi komitx' junoq tzet yetal, yowalil chi kotx'aj koq'ab' yetoq a'ej k'al xapon.

36.cak: Mani nachop ri awäch, ri atza'n chuqa ri achi'.
36.kjb: Man komonoq chi komitx' kosat, kotxam k'al koti'.

37.cak: Mani nachop ri awäch, ri atza'n chuqa ri achi'.
37.kjb: Man komonoq chi komitx' kosat, kotxam k'al koti'.

38.cak: Mani nachop ri awäch, ri atza'n chuqa ri achi'.
38.kjb: Man komonoq chi komitx' kosat, kotxam k'al koti'.

39.cak: K'o chi natz'apej ri achi chuqa' ri atz'an rik'in jun wuj su't toq yatat'ixom chuqa' taq yatojb'er. K'a ri k'o chi chanin nak'äq ri su't wuj.
39.kjb: Chi komaqchej el koti' k'al kotxam yet chon at'ixhli ma yet chi tit sk'ilajil konuq'. Chi koq'an swasub'al koq'ab' ma junoq txanb'alej.

40.cak: K'o chi natz'apej ri achi chuqa' ri atz'an rik'in jun wuj su't toq yatat'ixom chuqa' taq yatojb'er. K'a ri k'o chi chanin nak'äq ri su't wuj.
40.kjb: Chi komaqchej el koti' k'al kotxam yet chon at'ixhli ma yet chi tit sk'ilajil konuq'. Chi koq'an swasub'al koq'ab' ma junoq txanb'alej.

41.cak: K'o chi natz'apej ri achi chuqa' ri atz'an rik'in jun wuj su't toq yatat'ixom chuqa' taq yatojb'er. K'a ri k'o chi chanin nak'äq ri su't wuj.
41.kjb: Chi komaqchej el koti' k'al kotxam yet chon at'ixhli ma yet chi tit sk'ilajil konuq'. Chi koq'an swasub'al koq'ab' ma junoq txanb'alej.

42.cak: Taya' ka'i' metro a kojol kik'in ri winaqi'.
42.kjb: Najat chi jut koxol yetoq heb' jet animahil.

43.cak: Taya' ka'i' metro a kojol kik'in ri winaqi'.
43.kjb: Najat chi jut koxol yetoq heb' jet animahil.

44.cak: Taya' ka'i' metro a kojol kik'in ri winaqi'.
44.kjb: Najat chi jut koxol yetoq heb' jet animahil.

45.cak: Wi k'o k'atän chawij, k'o ojob' chawe' chuqa' wi man yatikir ta najq'aj awuxla', chanin takanuj jun aq'omanel.
45.kjb: Ta ay q'aq' jin, ay sq'aqachil konuq' k'ax ijan chi paxay kokaq'eq', ayman chon toj b'ay antewom.

46.cak: Wi k'o k'atän chawij, k'o ojob' chawe' chuqa' wi man yatikir ta najq'aj awuxla', chanin takanuj jun aq'omanel.
46.kjb: Ta ay q'aq' jin, ay sq'aqachil konuq' k'ax ijan chi paxay kokaq'eq', ayman chon toj b'ay antewom.

47.cak: Wi k'o k'atän chawij, k'o ojob' chawe' chuqa' wi man yatikir ta najq'aj awuxla', chanin takanuj jun aq'omanel.
47.kjb: Ta ay q'aq' jin, ay sq'aqachil konuq' k'ax ijan chi paxay kokaq'eq', ayman chon toj b'ay antewom.

48.cak: Kan k'o chi nawak'axaj ri rutzijol pa ruwi' ri COVID-19. Kan tanimaj kitzij ri nkib'ij ri aq'omanela' pa ruwi' re yab'il re'.
48.kjb: Kosayeq ek' ab'ix yib'an  COVID-19. Jiqejeq tzet chi yal heb' koyajawil.
